name: First Snow (Orczuk)
description:
First snow sees a father and his daughter catch the first snowflake of the first snow. Inspired by Learn to Fly and Burrito Bison you have to use upgrades to get further in the level. 

Slow down your speed as you avoid rooftops and angry birds to deliver on a special moment for a little girl.

Controls: 

ActionControlsLeftA  / Left Arrow
RightD / Right Arrow
Buy/Jump
Space
